item.title: User-Friendly Pattern Recognition
item.description: Currently, I’m working on an interesting project based on a university course. It should answer the question if it is possible to combine a good user experience with pattern recognition on n-dimensional time series. Background Before I start with the project I want to write a bit about the definitions. Time series A time series is a series of data points indexed (or listed or graphed) in time order.
